long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension application is being introduced to show and highlight the important notifications, action items, and alerts to the user so that, the user can view and take appropriate actions.

The user roles who will be using this Chrome Extension feature are Providers in the organisation.

Using this feature, the alerts and notifications such as setting up a follow-up medical visit for the patient, and recommending further medical actions by the providers to the selected patient are pushed to the respective users. By viewing these alerts and notifications, the user can take appropriate actions for the selected patient.
